greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: For n > 1, a(n) = gcd(A001414(n), A167344(n)) where A001414(n) is the sum of primes p dividing n (with repetition) and A167344(n) = b(n) is the totally multiplicative sequence with b(p) = (p-1)*(p+1) = p^2 - 1; a(1) = 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(p) = 1 for all primes p. - _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 03 2021
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, May 20 2019
